ygData.subject: Re: Studs and Bonding
ygData.msgSnippet: It takes 3 bits, 1 file and 1 water flask ... From: Tim West  To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com  Date: Monday, June 07,

It takes 3 bits, 1 file and 1 water flask
-----Original Message-----

>From: "Tim West" <twest@...>

>I'm not quite sure how many metal bits. I believe it is one. The basic
>blacksmithing book should tell you. It is rumored that smithing is more
>sucessful if you have the book in your inventory anyway. Also, a good
>website to visit would be www.everworld.net. They have a section called
>trade skills that has helped me a lot.

>Tanaman
>13th lev. Paladin
>Aradani guild
